item.description:
New Stuff:
The show is at 7:30. Should we see it at the Premium or at the regular Framingham 16? Vote now!


Old Stuff:
This is a wedding movie ? Big (aka John) and Carrie are finally tying the knot. 4 years after the series ended, the nuptials are under way. Come see Carrie, Charlotte, Miranda and Samantha in their first full-length feature!

If you can't wait until June 11, the Worcester movie meetup group is seeing this movie on Saturday, May 31 at the Westboro theater on Route 9. They'd love to have you! But if you can't make that show (I can't), then come join us for a Wednesday night show on the 11th.

Let's meet outside the theater and then go in and buy our discounted tickets together. (Tix are $8.50 each to FMM members and their guests; instead of $10.)

As always, guests are welcome. Just be sure to include them in your RSVP so I know how many people to expect.

We'll go out after the movie to discuss it and chat, if people are game.

My cell number is 508/308-4897 if you need to RSVP last minute (like w/in 2 hours of the show). The exact time of the show will be updated a few days before, as movie times don't come out this far ahead.

My email is dana@framesbydana.com. Email me if you have any questions.

Hope to see you soon!

?Dana
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my Meetup nametag and waiting outside by the parking lot. We'll
item.why: We love the girls, we love to laugh, we love to make new friends!
item.name: Sex and the City
